sentences.en: A: I finally got my rebate for my washer and dryer.
sentences.cn: 我终于拿回我的洗衣机和烘乾机的折扣金了.

sentences.en: All you need is a plastic bag, a hair dryer, and some string.
sentences.cn: 你需要的东西只有塑胶袋 、 吹风机和一些细绳.

sentences.en: Analyze the thermal and technologic features of iron printing dryer.
sentences.cn: 分析了印铁涂料烘房的热工特点和工艺特点.

sentences.en: Chambermaids will bring an iron or hair dryer on request.
sentences.cn: 只要提出要求，清理房间的女服务员就会送来熨斗或电吹风。

sentences.en: Do you know what happens when you put a linen suit in the dryer?
sentences.cn: 你知道你把亚麻西服放到烘干机里边会是什么结果 吗 ?
他昨天买了一台干燥机.

sentences.en: Is that what you're doing, living at home, jamming with the dryer?
sentences.cn: 你就在做这些?住在家里, 拿烘干机演奏?

sentences.en: Is there a washer and a dryer?
sentences.cn: 有洗衣机和烘干机 吗 ?

sentences.en: Oh, that sweet day when I moved into an apartment with a washer/dryer connection!
sentences.cn: 哦，当我搬进一座有洗衣机/烘干机连接着的公寓时，是多少甜蜜的一天。

sentences.en: Please close the door after finish using washing machine and dryer.
sentences.cn: 洗衣机及烘乾机使用后请随手将门关上.

sentences.en: She bought an electric hair dryer.
The clothes - dryer was a life - saver during the wet weather.
sentences.cn: 天气潮湿时乾衣机可帮了大忙了.

sentences.en: The florist had to thaw out our newly planted tulips with a hair dryer.
sentences.cn: 种花人得用吹风机把刚刚种植的郁金香解冻.

sentences.en: There is a washer and a dryer in the basement.
sentences.cn: 地下室里有洗衣机和烘干机.

sentences.en: Unlike other clothes, you cannot use a dryer for fireproofing a cloth.
sentences.cn: 不像其他的衣服，你不能用烘干机把防火衣烘干。

sentences.en: Well , I wanted to, but somebody threw my laundry out of the dryer while it was still wet.
sentences.cn: 我也想但是我裤子洗了还没干有人就把它扔出烘干机了!

sentences.en: You can tumble the clothes dry in a dryer.
sentences.cn: 你可以用烘干机将衣服烘干.

words.tran_cn: 干的；口渴的；枯燥无味的；禁酒的
干燥地；冷淡地；枯燥无味地
[化工][服装]烘干机；[助剂][涂料]干燥剂

trans.tran_en: a machine that dries things, especially clothes
